transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji, mem, kya hua?
Customer: Haan, sir. Kuch nahi, mai mera phone chal raha tha dusri side me. Mai ye bol rahi thi ki aap na pehle isko pura 6 mahine chalao. You will get the better.
Executive: Nahi nahi, mai nuksan karke kaam kaise karunga mem? Mai aapko abhi 50,000 salary hai, mai aapko bolunga 20,000 ki mere yaha aao, aap yaha kaam karo.
Customer: Sir, dekhiye aisa ki mahine do mahine service use karke, meri baat suno sir.
Executive: Aisa nahi hota hai, mai nuksan karke kyu kaam karunga? Mere ko pata hai nuksan kaise hota hai.
Customer: Aapko kaise pata nuksan ho raha hai sir? Abhi do mahine service chali hai.
Executive: Are, mem, do mahine kya chaliye? 3 mahine ho gaye. Do mahine kaha hue hai? Ye dekhiye, 3 mahine ho gaye. Mere ko pata hai nuksan chal raha hai. Aap mai business kar raha hu, aap kar rahe ho, ye bataiye aap.
Customer: Kya bol rahe hai?
Executive: Mai business kar raha hu, aap kar rahe ho.
Customer: Sir, business to aap hi kar rahe ho par hame bhi pata hai ki kitna business de pate hai saal bhar me.
Executive: Hain?
Customer: Saal bhar me kitna business de pate hai bata, ye bhi hame pata hai na ki kitna kar pate hai aap business kar rahe hai.
Executive: Haan, kitna kitna kar paya aap bataiye, kitna kitna de diya aapne business?
Customer: Lakh rupaye aaya na sir aapko? Aapne apne muh se accept kara hai ki mere ko aaya lakh rupaye ka business.
Executive: Haan, to lakh rupaye ka aa gaya to koi karodo thodi kar liye sahab.
Customer: To sir, ek mahine me karodo aa jayenge to uska lakh rupaye mai lungi bhi nahi na, fir mera bhi price utna hi jayega aapko mai order bhi nahi bhejungi.
Executive: To price utna hi jayega to mem kehne ka matlab abhi 3 mahine me 1 lakh ka business hua hai to ek saal me char, 4 lakh maan lete hai to usme kya niklega hamara?
Customer: Aap jab apna office khol ke baithte hai na sir, market me jab office khol ke baithte hai to ek hi din me aapko traffic nahi aa jata ki mera aaj pehla din hai dukan kholne ka aur aaj hi mere paas aapke paas buyer aata hai, competition hai sir, use karoge buyer nikaloge wahi hota hai hamare samne maxi kara ke dena main hai sir aapko.
Executive: Suniye meri baat, mai short wali baat janta hu, mai to kya hai anpadh aadmi hu, gawar aadmi hu. Samajh rahe ho na aap baat? Mere nuksan khane ki capability ek rupaye ki nahi hai. Bas seedhi baat hai.
Executive: Mai nuksan karke kabhi bhi business nahi karta hu.
Customer: Sir, dekho ye mera niyam hai aur siddhant hai. Sir, meri baat suniye. Mai aap isko service ko abhi use kariye. Mai isko fir se monitor karungi agle ek mahine me aapko kya response aa raha hai.
Executive: Nahi monitor karne ki jarurat hi nahi hai, aap to niju utar dijiye, fir mai monitor karta rahunga mere hisab se. Jo hoga wo dekha jayega. Aap bhale hi business ek bhi lead mat dijiye, mai aapko call bhi nahi karunga.
Customer: Sir, thik hai, koi baat nahi. Mai ek baar discuss karke aapko bata dungi aage but abhi abhi aisa kuch nahi hai, thik hai?
Executive: Nahi hai.
Executive: Ye to karna hi padega, fir mai mere mere hisab se kaam karunga.
Customer: Sir, dekhiye, karna hi padega. Humne aapko comment nahi kiya, koi aisa comment nahi kiya tha ki hum aapko mahine ko mahine denge.
Executive: Comment ki baat nahi hoti hai. Aapne ye kaha tha ki.
Customer: Aapne pehle isi tarike se aapne maxi karaya tab aapne bola maxi bhi nahi karaya aapne to aise business to nahi kar paoge sir aap kabhi maxi chalana hai, kabhi star chalana hai, kabhi aise nahi chalta na sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi, kaise nahi chalta hai? Aapne kaha tha 3 mahine me business nahi aayega to mai kar do kahi convert. Aur aap bol rahe ho.
Customer: Is point pe meri me business nahi aayega convert karne ke liye.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul comment pada hai mere paas.
Customer: Nahi, aapki baat idhar hui hai, Sonam mem se baat hui ki hamare se baat hui hogi? Humne to maine to aisa nahi bola aapko ki 3 mahine me.
Executive: Dono se sabse discuss hui hai. Sonam ji se.
Customer: Kis se bola tha aapko ki 3 mahine me nahi aayega hum kar denge? Kaha pe hai dikhao.
Executive: Haan, bilkul unhone kaha tha ki aap convert ho sakte ho 3 mahine ke andar.
Customer: Aapke paas agar kahi likhit me hai sir to mujhe bhej do aap.
Executive: Are mem, koi likhit me nahi hota hai. Likhit me to mere paas bhi aapke paas kya hai ki aap nahi karoge.
Customer: Kyu nahi hai? Humne likhit me diya hai. Mere se deal hui thi, maine proposal bheja hai, sara kuch hua tha.
Executive: Nahi, proposal bheja hai to ye thodi hota hai aap jabardasti customer ko khologe kya? Ye batao aap.
Customer: Jabardasti humne nahi kiya sir. Jabardasti aap khud aaye the star ke liye baat karne ke liye ki mere ko star de do.
Executive: Star ke liye baat karne ke liye aaye the to agar bande ke nuksan ho raha hai to usko jabardasti leke rakhoge kya? Ye bataiye aap lead bhi nahi de rahe ho aur ulta bol rahe ho humko hi ki bhai rakhna padega, kyu rakhna padega? Lead do ya to.
Executive: Lead aa hi nahi hai ek hafte se. Mai bewakoof hu kya?
Executive: Aap lead nahi de rahe ho, aap bahut jabardasti bol rahe ho ki rakhna padega.
Executive: Ye koi baat thodi hoti hai.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Sir, mai aap mujhe suniye ek baar.
Executive: Nahi, ye aisi baatein nahi hoti mem. Suniye, suniye meri baat. Aap salary base pe ho. Samajh rahe ho na aap meri baat? Aapko ek mahine bhi salary nahi milti ho na to dusri company dhundhne lag jate ho aap. Samajh rahe ho na baat meri?
Customer: Hum to 10 saal se sir yahi par baithe hue hai.
Executive: Haan, to aap yahi baithe ho, salary mil rahi hai uske piche baithe ho, business baithe ho.
Customer: Wahi to mai bol rahi hu ki aapko bhi paisa mil raha hai.
Executive: To wahi to mai bol raha hu aapko. Suniye meri baat. Shor macha diya ki nahi chahiye, nahi chahiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi, ye aisi koi baat thodi hoti hai. Nuksan karke kaun sa customer hai jo chalega?
Customer: Sir, mai aapko ye bol rahi hu ki thik hai aap mujhe thoda sa samay dijiye, mai aage baat karti hu fir mai aapko call karungi.
Executive: Lead hi nahi aa rahi iske sale ke 24 24 ghante baithe hai. Hum bewakoof hai kya?
Customer: Lead nahi aa rahi 1200 ka traffic dikh raha hai mujhe 750 dikh raha hai.
Executive: Are to 1200 ka dikh raha hai wo aa rahi hai 5 10,000 ki hum 5 10 5 10,000 me deal karenge. Yaha baithe rahenge kya bewakoof ki tarah?
Customer: Aati to hogi sir chhoti si bhi aati hogi badi si bhi aati hogi.
Executive: Nahi chhoti badi hai ek bhi batao customer jo cheez aayi hai maine bata diya aapko khul ke.
Customer: Koi baat nahi, aap mujhe meeting ka samay dijiye.
Executive: Mai aapko jhoot jhoot bolunga kya? Aap to wahi hai, aap sabhi ka wahi hai online walo ka jhoot bolna, ye bolna. Wo message nahi hota hai aisa kaam.
Customer: Haan, to thik hai sir aap mujhe samay dijiye, meeting ka samay dijiye aur uske baad me aap.
Executive: Haan, meeting kijiye, kuch bhi kijiye nahi to fir mai refund le lunga kya matlab rahega?
Customer: Haan, thik hai sir, aap mujhe meeting ka samay dijiye. Thik hai.
Executive: Ji, thik hai.
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Customer wants to convert the subscription.

- Customer is incurring losses due to the subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive will discuss the issue internally.

- Executive will get back to the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after internal discussion.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, convert
